channel.title: How do i make npcs stronger?
channel.description: I made a skelly combat health respawn [code]npc = 90 Skeleton 250 200 30[/code] And he is weak as hell.. his normal lvl is 22. I read that if u increase it he is stronger, Im not looking to increase damage\per hp it still shows hes lvl 22. Anyhelp?

item.title: How do i make npcs stronger?

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Oh it’s stupid dw, i fixed, i ahd to change a bunch of stuff, but it got fixed easily, i heart back-up files :D.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make npcs stronger?
item.dc:creator: @uno_da_cat uno_da_cat
item.description:
@uno_da_cat wrote:

[quote=“Fireweaver0, post:12, topic:253956”]thats close…to change hit damage go into NPChandler.java

else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1220) {
         npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451; // Vampire 
         hitDiff = 13 + misc.random(10);

just add with the others like it

change 13 is lowest hit and highest hit is 23 because 13+10=23[/quote]

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 90) { // skeleton hitDiff = 15 + misc.random(30);

This didnt work…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npcs stronger?

item.title: How do i make npcs stronger?
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

thats close…to change hit damage go into NPChandler.java

else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1220) {
         npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451; // Vampire 
         hitDiff = 13 + misc.random(10);

just add with the others like it

change 13 is lowest hit and highest hit is 23 because 13+10=23
